data.title: Au secours! (1924)
data.meta_description: A French/Italian fantasy film directed by Abel Gance. [...]
data.meta_site_name: EOFFTV - The Encyclopedia of Fantastic Film and Television
data.text:
France, Italy, 1924

18m, 40m (restored version (2000)), 900 metres (original version), 500 metres (re-edited version)

35mm film, black and white, 1.33:1

silent

A French/Italian fantasy film directed by Abel Gance.

Credits

Crew

Directed by: Abel Gance

Films Abel Gance, Unione Cinematografica Italiana

Produced by: Abel Gance

Script: Abel Gance, Max Linder

Directors of Photography: Émile Pierre, André-Wladimir Reybas, Georges Specht

Cast

Max Linder (Max)

Jean Toulout (Comte de Mornay)

Gina Palerme (Renée)

Gaston Modot

Alternative Titles

El castillo de los fantasmas – Spanish title

The Haunted House – UK title

Help! – US title

Max nel castello degli spettri – Italian title

Extracts included in

L'homme au chapeau de soie (1983)

Le fantôme d'Henri Langlois (2004)

References
